<title level="1" right="Rules">[Armor Class (AC)](/Rules.aspx?ID=3287)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
All creatures in the game have an [Armor Class](/Rules.aspx?ID=2295). This score represents how hard it is to hit and damage a creature. It serves as the Difficulty Class for hitting a creature with an attack.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
